name: Bed with pillows
description: A luxurious velvet upholstered bed for elegant bed with pillows.
detailOne: Transform your bedroom into a sanctuary of luxury with this velvet upholstered bed. Its plush headboard and footboard create a focal point, while the sturdy frame provides stability and support. The velvet fabric adds a touch of opulence to your sleeping space.

name: Wooden Dresser
description: A three door modern wooden dresser with ample storage.
detailOne: Organize your bedroom with this modern wooden dresser. It features multiple drawers and compartments for storing clothing, accessories, and personal items. The sleek design and clean lines add a contemporary touch to your bedroom decor.

name: Upholstered Storage Bench
description: An upholstered storage bench for practical and stylish seating.
detailOne: Add versatility to your bedroom with this upholstered storage bench. It features a cushioned seat upholstered in fabric for comfort and style. The storage compartment beneath the seat offers ample space for blankets, pillows, or other essentials.

name: Wooden Bedside Table
description: A vintage bedside table with timeless appeal.
detailOne: Enhance your bedroom decor with this vintage bedside table. Its compact size fits perfectly next to a bed, providing convenient storage and display space. The classic design and rustic finish add charm and character to your sleeping space.

name: Upholstered Headboard
description: A chic upholstered headboard for stylish bedroom decor.
detailOne: Transform your bedroom with this chic upholstered headboard. Its padded design offers comfort and support while adding a touch of elegance to your bed. The upholstered fabric is soft to the touch and available in various colors to suit your decor.

name: Sleek Platform Bed
description: A sleek platform bed for modern bedroom settings with white Pillows.
detailOne: Update your bedroom with this sleek platform bed. Its low-profile design and minimalist aesthetics create a contemporary focal point in any bedroom. The sturdy frame provides reliable support for a restful night's sleep.

name: white Wardrobe
description: A Wooden and white wardrobe with ample storage space.
detailOne: Organize your clothing and accessories with this rustic wooden wardrobe. Its spacious interior features hanging rods, shelves, and drawers for efficient storage. The distressed wood finish adds character and charm to your bedroom decor.

name: Mirrored Vanity Table
description: A mirrored vanity table for glamorous bedroom settings.
detailOne: Create a glamorous space with this mirrored vanity table. Its reflective surface adds brightness and sophistication to your bedroom decor. The spacious tabletop and drawers provide ample storage for cosmetics, jewelry, and beauty essentials.
